about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling adventure through time with Dino Clicker, a fun and addictive clicker game where you'll crack open an ancient egg to uncover a vast array of fascinating dinosaurs! With each egg you'll unlock a species, ranging from common favorites to rare and elusive creatures. Will you be able to collect them all? In Dino Clicker, your goal is simple: tap the egg repeatedly to hatch new dinosaurs. The more you click, the higher your chances of unlocking a new species. But beware - some dinosaurs are much rarer than others, requiring luck and perseverance to discover. As you progress, you'll build a collection of prehistoric creatures, each with its unique characteristics.

  • Multiple Dinosaurs: Unlock 9 different dinosaurs, ranging from common to rare species
  • Addictive Gameplay: Simple yet engaging clicker mechanics will keep you coming back for more
  • Randomized Egg Hatching: Each click brings an element of surprise and excitement
  • Casual Fun: Perfect for players looking for a lighthearted, relaxing experience

Play Dino Clicker today and start your journey through time to collect all the amazing dinosaurs. Will you be able to crack open the rarest eggs and become the ultimate dinosaur collector? There's only one way to find out!

name: Dino Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Tap repeatedly to crack open an ancient egg and collect 9 different dinosaurs, from common to rare and elusive creatures. Try out this addictive clicker game that challenges you to unlock them all through luck and perseverance!
